Detailed Description

Class PrimitiveCell to store function pointer to primitive scheme procedures.

make a primitive function call. (error if this is not a PrimitiveCell).

the function pointer to a primitive procedure stored in this cell.

bool PrimitiveCell::truth (  )  const [virtual]

Check if the the symbol in this cell is an operator. The truth value of the cell in an if statement.

Returns:
True iff the cell evaluates to non-zero value.

Implements Cell.
